title: Offline Missing Persons Alert App
description: Build a lightweight mobile app that caches missing persons alerts locally so volunteers in low-connectivity disaster zones can still access and share critical information. Use your existing web/app dev skills to create a PWA with service workers that syncs when online and works offline. Partner with a local search-and-rescue org to pilot it.

title: Offline-First Missing Persons Alert PWA
description: Build a progressive web app that caches missing persons alerts locally so volunteers in low-connectivity disaster zones can still access and share critical info. Use service workers to sync updates when connectivity is restored, and generate printable flyers directly from the app. Partner with one local search-and-rescue org to pilot it within 60 days.

title: Build an Offline Missing Persons Alert PWA
description: Create a lightweight Progressive Web App that caches missing persons alerts locally so volunteers in low-connectivity disaster zones can access and share critical case data without internet. Use the NamUs or NCMEC public APIs to sync when online, then serve cached data offline via service workers. Package it so community coordinators can install it on any smartphone and share case flyers via Bluetooth or local WiFi hotspot.
